attestation_invalid.creator_action: Request a new attestation from your issuer or verify that your issuer’s trust store is up to date.
attestation_invalid.remediation: Request a new attestation from your issuer or verify that your issuer’s trust store is up to date.

attestation_key_id_mismatch.creator_action: Ensure attestation subject_key_id matches manifest key_id.
attestation_key_id_mismatch.remediation: Ensure attestation subject_key_id matches manifest key_id.

attestation_key_mismatch.creator_action: Ensure attestation public key matches bundle public key.
attestation_key_mismatch.remediation: Ensure attestation public key matches bundle public key.

attestation_missing.creator_action: Provide an issuer attestation for the creator key.
attestation_missing.remediation: Provide an issuer attestation for the creator key.

attestation_not_yet_valid.creator_action: Wait until the attestation not_before timestamp or request an updated attestation.
attestation_not_yet_valid.remediation: Wait until the attestation not_before timestamp or request an updated attestation.

attestation_platform_mismatch.creator_action: Ensure attestation platform_binding matches the target platform.
attestation_platform_mismatch.remediation: Ensure attestation platform_binding matches the target platform.

attestation_purpose_mismatch.creator_action: Request an attestation with the required purpose.
attestation_purpose_mismatch.remediation: Request an attestation with the required purpose.

attestation_region_mismatch.creator_action: Ensure attestation region matches the platform requirements.
attestation_region_mismatch.remediation: Ensure attestation region matches the platform requirements.

attestation_usage_violation.creator_action: Update usage constraints or request an attestation that permits this usage.
attestation_usage_violation.remediation: Update usage constraints or request an attestation that permits this usage.

bundle_contents_mismatch.creator_action: Recreate the bundle from the original media and manifest.
bundle_contents_mismatch.message: Bundle contents do not match bundle.json
bundle_contents_mismatch.remediation: Recreate the bundle from the original media and manifest.

bundle_hash_mismatch.creator_action: Ensure bundle files were not altered after signing.
bundle_hash_mismatch.remediation: Ensure bundle files were not altered after signing.

bundle_manifest_hash_mismatch.creator_action: Recreate the bundle and re-embed the payload.
bundle_manifest_hash_mismatch.message: Bundle manifest hash mismatch for embedded payload
bundle_manifest_hash_mismatch.remediation: Recreate the bundle and re-embed the payload.

bundle_manifest_invalid.creator_action: Recreate the bundle to regenerate bundle.json and bundle.sig.
bundle_manifest_invalid.remediation: Recreate the bundle to regenerate bundle.json and bundle.sig.

bundle_manifest_missing.creator_action: Recreate the bundle; ensure bundle.json is included.
bundle_manifest_missing.remediation: Recreate the bundle; ensure bundle.json is included.

bundle_manifest_missing_entry.creator_action: Recreate the bundle to include all required entries.
bundle_manifest_missing_entry.remediation: Recreate the bundle to include all required entries.

bundle_media_missing.creator_action: Recreate the bundle with the media file included.
bundle_media_missing.remediation: Recreate the bundle with the media file included.

bundle_media_path_invalid.creator_action: Recreate the bundle to ensure media is under media/<filename>.
bundle_media_path_invalid.remediation: Recreate the bundle to ensure media is under media/<filename>.

bundle_missing_file.creator_action: Recreate the bundle to include all required files.
bundle_missing_file.remediation: Recreate the bundle to include all required files.

bundle_signature_missing.creator_action: Recreate the bundle; ensure bundle.sig is included.
bundle_signature_missing.remediation: Recreate the bundle; ensure bundle.sig is included.

bundle_unreadable.creator_action: Recreate the bundle and ensure it is not corrupted.
bundle_unreadable.remediation: Recreate the bundle and ensure it is not corrupted.

container_format_unsupported.creator_action: Use a supported container format or provide a sidecar.
container_format_unsupported.remediation: Use a supported container format or provide a sidecar.

container_payload_invalid.creator_action: Regenerate the container payload using the latest SDK.
container_payload_invalid.remediation: Regenerate the container payload using the latest SDK.

container_payload_mismatch.creator_action: Recreate the bundle and re-embed the payload.
container_payload_mismatch.remediation: Recreate the bundle and re-embed the payload.

container_payload_missing.creator_action: Re-embed the Origin payload or provide a sidecar.
container_payload_missing.remediation: Re-embed the Origin payload or provide a sidecar.

content_hash_mismatch.creator_action: Upload the exact media used to generate the bundle.
content_hash_mismatch.remediation: Upload the exact media used to generate the bundle.

content_hash_unchecked.creator_action: Provide the media file to verify content hash.
content_hash_unchecked.remediation: Provide the media file to verify content hash.

creator_mismatch.creator_action: Verify creator_id matches the platform account.
creator_mismatch.remediation: Verify creator_id matches the platform account.

key_id_mismatch.creator_action: Ensure manifest key_id matches the signing public key.
key_id_mismatch.remediation: Ensure manifest key_id matches the signing public key.

key_id_missing.creator_action: Include key_id in the manifest for registry enforcement.
key_id_missing.remediation: Include key_id in the manifest for registry enforcement.

key_registry_missing.creator_action: Provide a key registry for policy enforcement.
key_registry_missing.remediation: Provide a key registry for policy enforcement.

key_untrusted.creator_action: Register the key in the platform’s registry or generate a new active key.
key_untrusted.remediation: Register the key in the platform’s registry or generate a new active key.

manifest_invalid.creator_action: Regenerate the manifest from the original media.
manifest_invalid.remediation: Regenerate the manifest from the original media.

media_read_error.creator_action: Verify media path and file permissions.
media_read_error.message: Media file could not be read
media_read_error.remediation: Verify media path and file permissions.

payload_invalid_json.creator_action: Re-embed a valid Origin payload into the container.
payload_invalid_json.message: Embedded Origin payload is not valid JSON
payload_invalid_json.remediation: Re-embed a valid Origin payload into the container.

payload_missing_keys.creator_action: Ensure all required Origin payload keys are present.
payload_missing_keys.message: Embedded Origin payload missing required keys
payload_missing_keys.remediation: Ensure all required Origin payload keys are present.

platform_mismatch.creator_action: Add the platform to intended_platforms or re-sign for this platform.
platform_mismatch.remediation: Add the platform to intended_platforms or re-sign for this platform.

platform_missing.creator_action: Specify the platform id when verifying.
platform_missing.remediation: Specify the platform id when verifying.

policy_input_missing.creator_action: Provide the required policy inputs (registry, revocation, attestation).
policy_input_missing.remediation: Provide the required policy inputs (registry, revocation, attestation).

policy_unsupported.creator_action: Upgrade the SDK or disable unsupported policy features.
policy_unsupported.remediation: Upgrade the SDK or disable unsupported policy features.

policy_violation.creator_action: Adjust the policy configuration or use a compatible bundle.
policy_violation.remediation: Adjust the policy configuration or use a compatible bundle.

public_key_invalid.creator_action: Use a valid Ed25519 public key in PEM format.
public_key_invalid.message: Public key PEM invalid or not Ed25519
public_key_invalid.remediation: Use a valid Ed25519 public key in PEM format.

revocation_conflict.creator_action: Resolve conflicting revocations and regenerate the list.
revocation_conflict.remediation: Resolve conflicting revocations and regenerate the list.

revocation_entry_invalid.creator_action: Recreate the revocation entry with valid fields.
revocation_entry_invalid.remediation: Recreate the revocation entry with valid fields.

revocation_issuer_untrusted.creator_action: Ensure the revocation issuer is trusted by the platform.
revocation_issuer_untrusted.remediation: Ensure the revocation issuer is trusted by the platform.

revocation_list_missing.creator_action: Provide a revocation list for policy enforcement.
revocation_list_missing.remediation: Provide a revocation list for policy enforcement.

revocation_scope_unsupported.creator_action: Use a supported revocation scope or update the platform policy.
revocation_scope_unsupported.remediation: Use a supported revocation scope or update the platform policy.

revocation_signature_invalid.creator_action: Regenerate the revocation list signature using the correct issuer key.
revocation_signature_invalid.remediation: Regenerate the revocation list signature using the correct issuer key.

revoked.creator_action: This asset or key has been revoked. Use a different key or re-issue the asset with a new manifest.
revoked.remediation: This asset or key has been revoked. Use a different key or re-issue the asset with a new manifest.

seal_invalid.creator_action: Regenerate the seal and ensure the correct private key is used.
seal_invalid.remediation: Regenerate the seal and ensure the correct private key is used.

seal_required.creator_action: Use a sealed bundle for this policy.
seal_required.remediation: Use a sealed bundle for this policy.

seal_timestamp_invalid.creator_action: Regenerate the seal after creating the manifest.
seal_timestamp_invalid.remediation: Regenerate the seal after creating the manifest.

sidecar_read_error.creator_action: Check sidecar path and file permissions.
sidecar_read_error.message: Sidecar file could not be read
sidecar_read_error.remediation: Check sidecar path and file permissions.

signature_invalid.creator_action: Re-sign the manifest with the correct private key.
signature_invalid.remediation: Re-sign the manifest with the correct private key.

trust_store_empty.creator_action: Add issuer keys to the trust store.
trust_store_empty.remediation: Add issuer keys to the trust store.

trust_store_missing.creator_action: Provide a trust store of issuer keys.
trust_store_missing.remediation: Provide a trust store of issuer keys.
